Package com.lpoo.game.view.screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomizeMenuScreen
    A view representing the Customize Menu screen.
    GameScreen
    A view representing the game screen.
    HudMenu
    Class responsible for the HUD during the Game.
    LeaderboardMenuScreen
    Class responsible for controlling the Leaderboard's Menu Screen.
    LevelMenuScreen
    A view representing the Level Menu screen.
    LostMenu
    Class used to represent the pop up Menu that shows up when the User loses the game.
    MainMenuScreen
    A view representing the Main Menu screen.
    MenuScreen
    Abstract Class used to represent all Views that are Menus.
    NetworkingMenuScreen
    Class responsible for controlling the Networking Menu Screen.
    OptionsMenu
    Abstract class used to represent all the Pop Up Menu's classes, containing several option actions.
    PauseMenu
    Class used to represent the pop up Menu that shows up when the User pauses the game.
    WonMenu
    Class used to represent the pop up Menu that shows up when the User wins the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HudMenu.Request
    Possible Requests to the Game Screen.
